attributes.action: Debate allowing all of the People of the UK to decide the right Brexit deal
attributes.background: Currently the decision will be made at a political level, and given the democratic nature of choosing to leave, in the first place, the whole process should be carried out in the same tradition and not reduced to a cross party political argument.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
